para.text: definitions, a potentially useful feature for GIS applications. Unfortunately, I found enough differences between Illustrator's and CorelDraw's SVG support that getting Walls to work with the latter would have required more effort than it's worth. (No support of
, for example.) Besides that, Corel's development and promotion of their SVG technology apparently ended after a company reorganization in early 2004. I have not investigated Coreldraw X1, however.
